Summary: Home alone watching a film and my screen just went off
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sandefjord
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsHome alone watching a film and my screen just went off and igot up to get the charger and plugged it in and i went on my phone after sometime of attemts to google the problem when my phone was being unreponsive and the screen was flashing i looked up at the window and there it was. At first i thought it was the black helicopter circling around the estate but it was silent and then i realised what it was and then i thought: i need to get a pictuure of it I tried to slide to unlock but the screen kept going offi managed to budge it but my hands wear numb from shock and then i got it to just unlock and just took the picture. I felt like the air was heaving on me as i stared at it and i felt numb and weak but i just stood there like i needed to revise what was happening. I noticed it had been moving upwardsfrom the distance of the tree edge, and itjust suddenly swooped up like it was a elevater shaftgoing up a inisible tube. after that i had the worlds biggest head ache.
